alert.note: Alert for Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan County through 515 PM CDT... At 450 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Chaffee, or near Booneville, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Magazine... Caulksville... Barber... Chismville... Carolan... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
